blocks.name: bi1imp
blocks.content: Importation inference similar to ~ imp , except the outermost implication of the hypothesis is a biconditional. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi2imp
blocks.content: Importation inference similar to ~ imp , except both implications of the hypothesis are biconditionals. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi3impb
blocks.content: Similar to ~ 3impb with implication in hypothesis replaced by biconditional. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi3impa
blocks.content: Similar to ~ 3impa with implication in hypothesis replaced by biconditional. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi23impib
blocks.content: ~ 3impib with the inner implication of the hypothesis a biconditional. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi13impib
blocks.content: ~ 3impib with the outer implication of the hypothesis a biconditional. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi123impib
blocks.content: ~ 3impib with the implications of the hypothesis biconditionals. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi13impia
blocks.content: ~ 3impia with the outer implication of the hypothesis a biconditional. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi123impia
blocks.content: ~ 3impia with the implications of the hypothesis biconditionals. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi33imp12
blocks.content: ~ 3imp with innermost implication of the hypothesis a biconditional. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi23imp13
blocks.content: ~ 3imp with middle implication of the hypothesis a biconditional. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi13imp23
blocks.content: ~ 3imp with outermost implication of the hypothesis a biconditional. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi13imp2
blocks.content: Similar to ~ 3imp except the outermost and innermost implications are biconditionals. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi12imp3
blocks.content: Similar to ~ 3imp except all but innermost implication are biconditionals. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi23imp1
blocks.content: Similar to ~ 3imp except all but outermost implication are biconditionals. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: bi123imp0
blocks.content: Similar to ~ 3imp except all implications are biconditionals. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 6-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: 4animp1
blocks.content: A single hypothesis unification deduction with an assertion which is an implication with a 4-right-nested conjunction antecedent. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 30-May-2018.)

blocks.name: 4an31
blocks.content: A rearrangement of conjuncts for a 4-right-nested conjunction. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 30-May-2018.)

blocks.name: 4an4132
blocks.content: A rearrangement of conjuncts for a 4-right-nested conjunction. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 30-May-2018.)

blocks.name: expcomdg
blocks.content: Biconditional form of ~ expcomd . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 22-Jul-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
